title: emf induced around ring by changing magnetic field

content.description: An emf of 20 V is induced around a metal ring by increasing a uniform magnetic field at a constant rate from zero to a final magnitude of 1.0 × 10–2 T throughout the region enclosed by the ring. The field direction is perpendicular to the plane of the ring.
content.question: If the area enclosed by the ring is 4.0 × 10–3 m2 , what is the time interval during which the field is increased?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
